Name: Pokon Factory Survival
About the game: This game is to mine underground resources and escape from the planet. Initially, the mining machine is driven by wood as fuel. As the game progresses, it can be moved by electric power. Create ammunition and turrets, defeat enemies, build spaceships and escape. Instructions alt + enter : switches to full screen Left click: attack, placement Right click: Use item, cancel w.a.s.d key :move 1.2.3.4 key : change weapons i key : Open your inventory.
